@ candy474 - this is probably because you're trying to install it with a DVD (I had this issue with another Adobe software). If this is the case, copy all the files/folders (which are on your DVD) somewhere on your hard disc, and run the setup.exe (in Adobe Flash Professional CS5.5\SOFTWARE - folder), good luck!
